description: Charlotte begged to come back to redeem herself. Not that she needed to, but she wanted to come back to prove all of the nay sayers that she was not a little princess and could take it like the best of them. She is put in grueling bondage immediately and the torment begins. The Pope is not holding back in his sadistic brutality, and you see Charlotte struggling to get through it. She not only gets through it, but she is water boarded and then a zipper ripped from her flesh to finally destroy her.
title: Princess Revisits Hogtied to Prove Herself to The Pope
